alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:52AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Clark and southern Pike Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 651 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro... Okolona... Narrows Dam... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Delight... Antoine... Billstown... Nathan... Pisgah... Roy... Pike City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
